properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "count" FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , VIEW_COUNT , WRITE_DATE , MN_NO , NOTICE_YN FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NO_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , VIEW_COUNT , WRITE_DATE , MN_ID , NOTICE_YN FROM NOTICE JOIN MANAGER_INFO USING (MN_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , MN_NO , WRITE_DATE , VIEW_COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE ? AND NO_STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_YN , MN_NO ) VALUES ( 'N-'||LPAD(SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE NOTICE SET NO_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_YN = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
